headline: Is Align Technology (ALGN) the Best High-Risk Stock to Buy According to Billionaires?
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Best High-Risk Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Align Technology, Inc.
